Posts.Content: Hi all, My 27 year old daughter, went to doc's monday this week with a lump she'd found, on examination gp found 9-- 5 in breast 4 under arm, plus scaley nipple inverted and puss, I'm absolutely devastated. we don't find out until the 2nd aug what plan of action is with surgeons. I'm not sure I can cope..We lost another of our daughters 10 years ago and one of our son's four and hlf years ago. I / we are totally lost, I want to grab some one and shake them by the throat and ask why, just whyÂ
Posts.Title: My daughter
